definitions.definition: A native or inhabitant of the south of a region (or of the world as a whole), such as the United Kingdom .
Alternative letter-case form of Southerner ( someone from one of the southeastern United States ) .

main_definition: A native or inhabitant of the south of a region (or of the world as a whole), such as the United Kingdom .
secondary_definitions: Alternative letter-case form of Southerner ( someone from one of the southeastern United States ) .
